index.note: Ask AI only uses public Focus Squad pages. If it cannot find an answer on the site, it will say so instead of guessing.

askAi.title: What Ask AI can and can't do
askAi.intro: Ask AI answers using only information that appears on Focus Squad pages. If a question is not covered on the site, it will say so.
canDo: Explain Focus Squad features and where to find them.
Summarize public pages so you can move faster.
Point you to the right tool when you are unsure.
refuses: Personal data like your stats, tasks, habits, minutes, or streaks.
General knowledge questions that are not about Focus Squad.
askAi.privacyBody: Ask AI cannot access your account, profile, or private activity. It always keeps personal data out of the conversation.
